quote_a: Basically, I would like it to proactively manage the admin tasks that I would do myself, freeing up my time to focus on more creative work.
quote_b: However, at the moment, I would not allow the AI to autonomously do things because it still makes mistakes.
explanation: The participant expresses a strong desire for AI to autonomously manage admin tasks, then immediately states they would not allow autonomous AI action due to reliability concerns.

quote_a: I think it would need to be connected to those apps in order to autonomously do things on my behalf.
quote_b: Realistically, I probably would not give the AI that much access to my personal data because I would be concerned about the privacy implications of that.
explanation: The participant acknowledges that app connectivity is required for their desired autonomous AI, but then admits they would not grant the data access that this connectivity requires.
